title: Switchboard marking
fullText:
The face of switchboards shall be permanently marked with the system voltage and either 'V a.c.' or system frequency.
EXAMPLE: '230 V a.c.' or '230 Vâ€“50 Hz'
If the frequency is other than 50 Hz, the frequency shall be indicated.
For three-phase systems the system voltage, phase, and number of conductors shall be indicated.
